name: part_006
file: tmp_【お誕生日】BirthdayLive2021【＃ときのそら誕生日2021】 [lXdX1S1-Mxc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora and AZKi perform 'Setsuna Tick Code'. AZKi is projected on the screen while Sora is on the stage.
Tokino Sora and AZKi perform 'Kurenai Chronicle'.

subtitles.original: ...見られる
subtitles.english: ...be seen

subtitles.original: 何度だって歌うから
subtitles.english: Because I'll sing any number of times

subtitles.original: 君の場所がいつか光に包み込まれるように
subtitles.english: So that your place will one day be enveloped in light

subtitles.original: 全てが崩れ落ちそうで
subtitles.english: When it feels like everything is falling apart

subtitles.original: どこにも足踏み出せない時は
subtitles.english: And you can't take a step anywhere

subtitles.original: 送り続けるこの言葉
subtitles.english: I'll keep sending these words

subtitles.original: 聴こえる場所探し踏み出すよ
subtitles.english: Searching for a place where they can be heard and stepping forward

subtitles.original: 飲み込んだ想い青い空に飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Let your swallowed feelings fly into the blue sky

subtitles.original: 繋がるメロディ流れる星に止まっていく
subtitles.english: The connecting melody stops at the shooting stars

subtitles.original: 君のために歌うよ
subtitles.english: I'll sing for you

subtitles.original: 君に届くようにと
subtitles.english: So that it reaches you

subtitles.original: 輝きは世界中を越えていく
subtitles.english: The radiance transcends the world

subtitles.original: 確かにここで重ね合えた鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeats that certainly synchronized here

subtitles.original: 触れ合う音が光になって降り注ぐ
subtitles.english: The touching sounds turn into light and pour down

subtitles.original: この一瞬が永遠だと
subtitles.english: That this moment is eternal

subtitles.original: 煌めいては色付いていく
subtitles.english: Sparkling and taking on color

subtitles.original: 君と描いた世界
subtitles.english: The world I drew with you

subtitles.original: 君と描く音が飛び出す
subtitles.english: The sounds I draw with you fly out

subtitles.original: 刹那ティックコードまで
subtitles.english: Up to the Setsuna Tick Code

subtitles.original: 紅藍クロニクル 作詞・作曲 AZKi
subtitles.english: Kurenai Chronicle Lyrics & Composition: AZKi

subtitles.original: いつの間に隠れた無数の星よ
subtitles.english: Oh, countless stars that hid before I knew it

subtitles.original: 今君はどこで輝いているんだろう
subtitles.english: Where are you shining now, I wonder?

subtitles.original: 今夜を彷徨う無数の旅路
subtitles.english: Countless journeys wandering through tonight

subtitles.original: 今僕をどこへ連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: Where will they take me now?

subtitles.original: 僕らが出会うため 世界中で
subtitles.english: In order for us to meet, throughout the world

subtitles.original: 共に生きてくため 二人きり
subtitles.english: In order to live together, just the two of us

subtitles.original: ただこの空の先 どこまでも
subtitles.english: Just beyond this sky, forever

subtitles.original: 呼び覚ませ心にあるものを
subtitles.english: Awaken what is in your heart

subtitles.original: 殻を破り飛び立つように
subtitles.english: Like breaking out of a shell and taking flight

subtitles.original: 果てない青が闇を貫く 煌めく光になれ
subtitles.english: The endless blue pierces the darkness, become a sparkling light

subtitles.original: 悲しさよ 寂しさの 雨打たれても
subtitles.english: Oh sadness, oh loneliness, even if struck by rain

subtitles.original: 辿り着く音 確かなメロディ それはきっと嘘じゃないよ
subtitles.english: The sound that arrives, a certain melody, it's surely not a lie

subtitles.original: ここでいつまでもいつまでも 二人歌い合おう
subtitles.english: Here, forever and ever, let's sing together

subtitles.original: 誰にも見せない 弱さがほら
subtitles.english: Look, the weakness I show to no one

subtitles.original: こぼれては力に変わっていくから
subtitles.english: Is overflowing and turning into strength

subtitles.original: 誰かを信じる 勇気を持って
subtitles.english: Have the courage to believe in someone

subtitles.original: 振り切って 前へと進むだけだ
subtitles.english: Shake it off and just move forward

subtitles.original: 僕らの存在は バーチャルで
subtitles.english: Our existence is virtual

subtitles.original: ふわりなんて言わせない リアルなんだ
subtitles.english: Won't let anyone say it's vague, it's real

subtitles.original: だってこの魂は 本物だ
subtitles.english: Because this soul is the real thing

subtitles.original: 打ち砕け理不尽も常識も
subtitles.english: Smash the absurdity and common sense

subtitles.original: 壁を超えて逆らうように
subtitles.english: Like crossing walls and defying

subtitles.original: 果てない赤が闇を貫く 脈打つ血汐になれ
subtitles.english: The endless red pierces the darkness, become pulsing lifeblood

subtitles.original: 愛おしさや 切なさも 覚えていくの
subtitles.english: I'll learn about love and sadness too

subtitles.original: 作り出す音 確かなハーモニー これは生きた証だから
subtitles.english: The sound created, a certain harmony, because this is proof of having lived

subtitles.original: 声を聴かせてよ 聴かせてよ 二人歌い合おう
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voice, let me hear it, let's sing together
